attributes.additional_details: We want the Government or Parliament to allow frontline workers to carry pepper spray because they often face dangerous situations while performing their duties. Providing them with a non-lethal means of self-defense will significantly enhance their safety and confidence. This measure will help protect those who protect us, ensuring they can continue their essential work without unnecessary risk. Please support our campaign to safeguard our frontline heroes.
attributes.background: We urge the Government or Parliament to allow frontline workers to carry pepper spray for self-defense. This tool enhances their safety on duty and offers reliable protection against threats, reducing risks and contributing to a safer environment. Please consider our petition.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure who you mean by frontline workers.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
